TITLE: Installing Backstage from Chart Repository using Helm
DESCRIPTION: Commands to add the Backstage chart repository and install a chart using Helm. This is the standard method for installing Backstage via Helm charts.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/charts/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: console
CODE:
```
helm repo add backstage https://backstage.github.io/charts
```

LANGUAGE: console
CODE:
```
helm upgrade -i <release_name> backstage/backstage
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Backstage using Helm Chart Repository
DESCRIPTION: Commands to add the Backstage Helm chart repository and install a Backstage release using Helm. This is the quickest way to get started with Backstage on Kubernetes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/charts/blob/main/charts/backstage/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: console
CODE:
```
helm repo add backstage https://backstage.github.io/charts

helm install my-release backstage/backstage
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Backstage from Helm Chart Repository with upgrade option
DESCRIPTION: Command to install or upgrade a Backstage release from the Helm chart repository. The upgrade option (-i) ensures it will install if not present or upgrade if it already exists.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/charts/blob/main/charts/backstage/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: console
CODE:
```
helm upgrade -i <release_name> backstage/backstage
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Backstage from OCI Registry using Helm
DESCRIPTION: Command to install Backstage charts from an OCI (Open Container Initiative) registry using Helm, specifying a particular version.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/charts/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
helm upgrade -i <release_name> oci://ghcr.io/backstage/charts/backstage --version=<version>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Backstage from OCI Registry
DESCRIPTION: Command to install a specific version of Backstage from the OCI Registry. This method allows installing from the GitHub Container Registry with version specification.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/charts/blob/main/charts/backstage/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
helm upgrade -i oci://ghcr.io/backstage/charts/backstage --version=<version>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Backstage with ConfigMap via Helm Chart
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to configure Backstage by adding appConfig to the Helm values file. The configuration will be stored in a ConfigMap and automatically mounted as a configuration file in the Backstage instance.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/charts/blob/main/charts/backstage/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: diff
CODE:
```
  backstage:
+   appConfig:
+     app:
+       baseUrl: https://somedomain.tld
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Referencing Secrets in Backstage Helm Values
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to reference Kubernetes secrets in the Backstage Helm chart values configuration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/charts/blob/main/charts/backstage/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
backstage:
  extraEnvVarsSecrets:
    - my-backstage-secrets
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Kubernetes Secrets for Backstage
DESCRIPTION: Example of creating a Kubernetes Secret manifest for storing sensitive Backstage configuration values.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/charts/blob/main/charts/backstage/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  name: my-backstage-secrets
type: Opaque
data:
  BACKEND_SECRET: YmFja3N0YWdl
  POSTGRES_PASSWORD: aHVudGVyMg==
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Overriding App Config Values in Backstage Helm Chart
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to override app-config.yaml values using environment variables with the APP_CONFIG prefix in the Helm configuration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/charts/blob/main/charts/backstage/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
backstage:
  extraEnvVars:
    - name: APP_CONFIG_backend_cache_store
      value: memory
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Extra Config Files to Backstage Deployment
DESCRIPTION: Configuration example showing how to add additional configuration files to Backstage using ConfigMaps in the Helm values.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/charts/blob/main/charts/backstage/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
backstage:
  extraAppConfig:
    - filename: app-config.extra.yaml
      configMapRef: my-app-config
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Environment Variables in Backstage Helm Chart
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to add custom environment variables to a Backstage deployment using the extraEnvVars configuration in the values.yaml file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/charts/blob/main/charts/backstage/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
backstage:
  extraEnvVars:
    - name: MY_PLUGIN_HOST
      value: http://my-plugin-host
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Uninstalling Backstage Helm Release
DESCRIPTION: Command to uninstall and remove a Backstage release deployed with Helm. This removes all Kubernetes components associated with the chart and deletes the release.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/charts/blob/main/charts/backstage/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: console
CODE:
```
helm uninstall my-backstage-release
```
